derived.description: Compute time derivative with a preferred time unit
Sample a grid at times specified (ex: if a year is specified all times of that year are displayed)
derived.formula: getSamplesAtTimes(grid,user_year[isuser=true,default=None,label=Year as yyyy],user_season[isuser=true,default=None,label=Season (ex: JJA)],user_mon[isuser=true,default=None,label=Mon of year as MM],user_day[isuser=true,default=None,label=Day of a month as dd],user_hour[isuser=true,default=None,label=Hour of day as hh],user_min[isuser=true,default=None,label=Minute of hour as mm],user_sec[isuser=true,default=None,label=Seconds as ss],user_ms[isuser=true,default=None,label=Millisecons as ms])

derived.description: Compute time means at specified time type

derived.formula: createNewUnit(grid,user_newUnitName[isUser=true,default=anystring,label=Create/Set to new unit name],user_multiplyfactor[isUser=true,default=1.0,label=Scale data by factor])

derived.description: Compute anomaly from time means at specified time type

Deviation from Lat Lon Time Average
circular hor. smoothing, in grid increments
